ideas.title: Meta is developing a new image and video model for a 2026 release, report says
ideas.description: The company is working on an image and video model and new text-based model, which aids with coding.
hooks: Meta's Secret AI: What They're Not Telling You
Future of AI: Meta's Unreleased Model Revealed
2026 Game-Changer: Inside Meta's Next AI Breakthrough

tips: Enable live chat interaction during stream
Prepare pre-submitted audience questions in advance
Use YouTube's Q&A timestamp feature for viewer engagement

visualDirection.description: High-energy cyberpunk-inspired visual aesthetic with dynamic blue/purple gradient overlays, futuristic typography in sans-serif, animated data visualization elements, picture-in-picture tech schematics, motion-tracked AI model renderings with translucent information layers

exampleOutline: Section 1: Dramatic Live Stream Intro & Breaking News Reveal
Section 2: Meta's AI Strategy Context & Market Positioning
Section 3: Detailed Model Capabilities & Technical Breakdown
Section 4: Potential Industry Implications & Expert Analysis

visualDirection.description: High-contrast cyberpunk-inspired palette with deep blues and electric teals. Dynamic split-screen compositions showing AI interfaces and human interaction. Sleek, futuristic sans-serif typography with subtle motion tracking. Incorporate holographic graphic overlays and subtle data visualization elements. Reference aesthetic of 'Black Mirror' and modern tech documentaries.

ideas.title: OpenAI is reportedly trying to raise $100B at an $830B valuation
ideas.description: The ChatGPT maker is aiming to raise the funding by the end of the first quarter in 2026, and the company may ask sovereign wealth funds to invest in the round.
hooks: How OpenAI Might Become a $830B Giant
Billion-Dollar AI: OpenAI's Insane Valuation Play

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings of financial charts/graphs
Include picture-in-picture commentary with animated annotations
Create chapter markers highlighting key funding stages
Use engaging B-roll of tech headquarters and AI infrastructure

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech-inspired color palette (deep blues, electric teals, sharp whites). Geometric motion graphics representing financial data. Clean, technical typography with sharp sans-serif fonts. Animated infographic elements showing funding progression. Minimal but dynamic visual storytelling with data-driven aesthetic.

exampleOutline: Opening: Shocking Funding Headline Reveal (30s)
Context: Current AI Investment Landscape (2min)
Deep Dive: OpenAI's $100B Fundraising Strategy (3-4min)
Implications: What This Means for AI Future (2min)
Closing CTA: Subscribe/Follow for More Insights (30s)
